content: "Heaven" by Fatboy Slim is a song about feeling good and enjoying life. The lyrics talk about how everyone has their own idea of what heaven is and how it can be different for everyone. The song encourages people to find their own version of heaven and to enjoy the things that make them happy. It's a song about having fun and living in the moment. To a 5-year-old, this song is talking about how everyone has their own special place or activity that makes them happy and that they should try to find and enjoy it.
